physicalTable.name: SAMP_TIME_DAY_D
physicalTable.description: Time dimension table at day grain. Stores one record for each day.

physicalColumns.name: Beg_of_Mth_Wid
physicalColumns.description:
Beginning of Mth Wid: Stores the value in the format YYYYMMDD.
For the day key 20100202, Beg_of_Qtr_Wid will be 20100201.

physicalColumns.name: Beg_of_Week_Wid
physicalColumns.description:
Beginning of Week Wid: Stores the value in the format YYYYMMDD.
For the day key 20100202, Beg_of_Week_Wid will be 20100131.

physicalColumns.name: Per_Name_Month
physicalColumns.description:
Period Name Month: Stores the year information in the format YYYY / MM.
Eg:- 2009 / 01

physicalColumns.name: Fscl_Month
physicalColumns.description: Fiscal Month : Stores the value 1, 2, 3.. upto 12.

physicalColumns.name: Julian_Day_Num
physicalColumns.description:
Julian Day Number : Stores the day number in the Julian Calendar format.
Eg:- 40570, 40571 and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Per_Name_Qtr
physicalColumns.description:
Period Name Quarter: Stores the quarter information in the format YYYY QQuarterNumber.
Eg:- 2009 Q1

physicalColumns.name: Per_Name_Half
physicalColumns.description:
Period Name Half: Stores the Half year information in the format YYYY HYHalfYearNumber.
Eg:- 2009 HY1

physicalColumns.name: Cal_Week
physicalColumns.description: Calendar Week: Stores value 1,2,3 ..upto 53.

physicalColumns.name: Days_in_Qtr
physicalColumns.description: Days in Quarter : Stores value 90, 91 or 92

physicalColumns.name: Cal_Half
physicalColumns.description: Calendar Half: Stores value 1 or 2

physicalColumns.name: Calendar_Date
physicalColumns.description: Calendar Date: Stores the information in date format .

physicalColumns.name: Fscl_Qtr
physicalColumns.description: Fiscal Quarter : Stores the value 1, 2, 3 or 4

physicalColumns.name: Day_Of_Year
physicalColumns.description: Day of Year: Stores the values 1, 2, 3.. upto 366.

physicalColumns.name: Fscl_Half
physicalColumns.description: Fiscal Half : Stores the value 1 or 2

physicalColumns.name: Cal_Qtr
physicalColumns.description: Calendar Quarter: Stores value 1,2,3 or 4

physicalColumns.name: Cal_Month
physicalColumns.description: Calendar Month: Stores value 1,2,3 ..upto 12

physicalColumns.name: Cal_Year
physicalColumns.description: Calendar Year: Stores value in the format YYYY

physicalColumns.name: Fscl_Week
physicalColumns.description: Fiscal Week : Stores the value 1, 2, 3.. upto 53

physicalColumns.name: Day_Of_Month
physicalColumns.description: Day of Month: Stores the values 1, 2, 3.. upto 31.

physicalColumns.name: Fscl_Year
physicalColumns.description: Fiscal Year : Stores the fiscal year in the format YYYY

physicalColumns.name: Per_Name_Week
physicalColumns.description:
Period Name Week: Stores the week information in the format YYYY Week Weeknumber.
Eg:- 2009 Week 1

physicalColumns.name: Day_Of_Week
physicalColumns.description: Day of Week: Stores the values 1, 2, 3.. upto 7.

physicalColumns.name: Per_Name_Year
physicalColumns.description:
Period Name Year: Stores the year information in the format YYYY.
Eg:- 2009

physicalColumns.name: Loaded
physicalColumns.description:
Loaded: Flag to indicate if data is loaded for the specific month. 
Possible values are 1 or 0.

physicalColumns.name: Julian_Qtr_Num
physicalColumns.description:
Julian Quarter Number : Stores the quarter number in the Julian Calendar format. 
Eg:- 151, 152 and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Holiday
physicalColumns.description:
Holiday : Flag to indicate if a day is holiday or not.
Possible vlaues are 0 or 1.

physicalColumns.name: Julian_Week_Num
physicalColumns.description:
Julian Week Number : Stores the week number in the Julian Calendar format. 
Eg:- 2180, 2181 and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Day_Key
physicalColumns.description:
Day Key: Surrogate key of the table. Stores the day information in the format YYYYMMDD.
Eg:- 20090101

physicalColumns.name: Days_in_Mth
physicalColumns.description: Days in Month : Stores value 28, 29, 30 or 31.

physicalColumns.name: Julian_Month_Num
physicalColumns.description:
Julian Month Number : Stores the month number in the Julian Calendar format. 
Eg:- 500, 501 and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Beg_of_Qtr_Wid
physicalColumns.description:
Beginning of Qtr Wid: Stores the value in the format YYYYMMDD.
For the day key 20100202, Beg_of_Qtr_Wid will be 20100101.
